p: Because there are no EPA and DHA in edible vegetable oil, we decided to select saturated fatty acid, monounsaturated fatty acid, linoleic acid, Î±-linolenic acid, total atherogenic fatty acid (C12:0 + C14:0 + C16:0), vitamin E, and phytosterol as evaluation indexes finally. Table 3 shows the daily performance of the seven indicators.
